definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Similar to flash agreements, in very strategic area.
sentences.chinese: 与快闪协议相似，也是用在非常有战略性的领域。

sentences.english: The smallpox vaccine is a completely new product that will be added to the Strategic National Stockpile.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种全新的牛痘疫苗，将加入战略性国家贮备。

sentences.english: Their strategic feints and jabs at each other are the ones that matter now.
sentences.chinese: 现在重要的是它们相互之间战略性的佯攻和猛击。

sentences.english: ADSI is Microsoft strategic set of directory access interfaces.
sentences.chinese: ADSI是微软的战略性目录访问接口。

sentences.english: Forecast for logistics demand is the base for enterprise planning and decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 物流需求预测是物流活动的战略性和规划性决策基础。

sentences.english: If the need is strategic, you should always build the solution yourself.
sentences.chinese: 如果需求是战略性的，您往往需要自己构建解决方案。

sentences.english: They're uncomfortable examining the big, strategic issues.
sentences.chinese: 内审员对评审大的战略性问题感到不安。

sentences.english: They labour to fulfil the "strategic plans" of their corporate commissars.
sentences.chinese: 他们努力工作来完成公司决策层的战略性规划。

sentences.english: A feng-sui man cannot really give you answers on those strategic questions.
sentences.chinese: 风水师并不能为你回答这些战略性的问题。

sentences.english: This is one has the contemporaneity and the strategic major decision.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个具有时代性和战略性的重大决策。

sentences.english: Focused on analyzing the strategic adjustment of the regional economic development impact on the security plan.
sentences.chinese: 重点分析了区域经济战略性调整对安图发展影响。

sentences.english: We will continue to make strategic adjustments in the distribution and structure of the state-owned sector.
sentences.chinese: 我们要继续推进国有经济布局和结构战略性调整。

sentences.english: Carbon finance could be used strategically to foster larger-scale, long-term low-carbon development.
sentences.chinese: 碳融资可战略性地用于促进更大规模的长期低碳增长。

sentences.english: It is a strategic move that could well pay off for Hermes.
sentences.chinese: 这是一项战略性举措，可以很好报复爱马仕。

sentences.english: Your company can demonstrate best practice by engaging strategically with such a cause.
sentences.chinese: 您的企业可以通过战略性参与此类事件示范最佳实践。

sentences.english: This paper is about the Sinco Company's strategic acquisition to the Rainbow Company.
sentences.chinese: 本文是关于新科公司对彩虹公司的战略性收购的探讨。

definition: to overtake on a bend (driving)/(fig.) taking opportunity of tight corners to make swift progress (economy etc)
